```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights13)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(cache = TRUE)
```


## Histogram of air time of all flights

```{r}
flights %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_histogram(
    aes(x = air_time),
    na.rm = TRUE,
    binwidth = 15
  )
```


```{r}
flights %>%
  filter(dest != "HNL") %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_histogram(
    aes(x = air_time),
    na.rm = TRUE,
    binwidth = 15
  )
```


```{r}
flights %>%
  filter(dest != "HNL") %>%
  filter(between(air_time, 400, 500)) %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_histogram(
    aes(x = air_time),
    na.rm = TRUE,
    binwidth = 10
  )
```

## All very close relations

```{r}
flights %>%
  filter(air_time < 60) %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_bin2d(aes(origin, dest))
```
